[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#f7f7f7″ background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_text_color=”#86754E” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Client Referrals

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” module_alignment=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A number of our clients have asked us to speak with their friends, family members or colleagues about how we can help them solve their financial challenges.

We are honored to receive requests and it is a privilege to accommodate them. If there’s someone you think we should know, we first want you to be aware of how we approach such requests:

[/et_pb_text][dsm_icon_list icon_padding=”6px” list_vertical_alignment=”flex-start” list_space_between=”12px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”500px” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_icon_list_child text=”Confidentiality is the cornerstone of our business;” font_icon=”%%36%%” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”We never discuss any client relationship with third parties without the client’s explicit permission.” font_icon=”%%36%%” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”We guarantee thoughtful and courteous service.” font_icon=”%%36%%” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”We never offer advice without thoroughly understanding the client’s specific needs.” font_icon=”%%36%%” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][/dsm_icon_list][dsm_pricelist _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_pricelist][dsm_contact_form_7 cf7_library=”422″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” labels_font=”|700||on|||||” labels_letter_spacing=”2px” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_contact_form_7][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*In accordance with privacy legislation, the individuals you are referring must consent to their information being provided to us.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F7F7F7″ custom_padding=”30px|3%|30px|3%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”footer-heading” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_font=”Mulish|700||on|||||” header_4_text_color=”#86754E” header_5_font=”Mulish|||on|||||” header_5_font_size=”14px” header_5_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

excerpt.rendered:
Contact UsClient ReferralsA number of our clients have asked us to speak with their friends, family members or colleagues about how we can help them solve their financial challenges. We are honored to receive requests and it is a privilege to accommodate them. If there’s someone you think we should know, we first want you to be aware of how we approach such requests:

  • EConfidentiality is the cornerstone of our business;
  • EWe never discuss any client relationship with third parties without the client’s explicit permission.
  • EWe guarantee thoughtful and courteous service.
  • EWe never offer advice without thoroughly understanding the client’s specific needs.

    Please note that we cannot accept instructions for trades or other time-sensitive information via this form.

    *In accordance with privacy legislation, the individuals you are referring must consent to their information being provided to us.Montreal Pointe-Claire Office 1 Holiday Avenue, East TowerSuite 305Pointe-Claire, QC H9R 5N3 T: 514-782-5966Toronto Yorkville Office 166 Davenport RoadToronto, Ontario M5R 1J2 T: 416-777-7176
